fields.summary: Android: Double click or double tap events don't work for a label which is created under a view
fields.environment: Android Emulator 2.3.3 both V8 and Rhino

comments.body: Tested with 2.0.1GA2 on a Samsung Galaxy S2, unable to reproduce the issue. Ticket closed.

Environment used for verification -
Tested with Titanium SDK: 2.1.1.v20120712160111,2.0.1GA2
Tested with Titanium Â Studio: 2.1.1.201207121732
Device - Android Emulator 2.3.3, Samsung Galaxy Note
Machine OS - MAC 10.7.3

Unable to reproduce it.So,closing this ticket.
